name: ERC20 Wrapper
description: Extension that allows users deposit and withdraw 'underlying tokens' and receieve a matching number of 'wrapped tokens'.

eventDecorators.name: Token transfer
eventDecorators.description: Indicates that ERC20 transfer has occurred.

parameterDecorators.name: Sender address
parameterDecorators.description: Address from which the ERC20 token was sent.

parameterDecorators.name: Recipient address
parameterDecorators.description: Address to which the ERC20 token was sent.

parameterDecorators.name: Token amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of ERC20 token that was sent.

functionDecorators.name: Deposit for
functionDecorators.description: Deposits underlying token and creates the equal amount of wrapped tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: Amount
parameterDecorators.description: Amount of the underlying tokens to deposit.

functionDecorators.name: Withdraw to
functionDecorators.description: Withdraws underlying token and burns the equal amount of wrapped tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: Amount
parameterDecorators.description: Amount of the underlying tokens to withdraw.
